title: "The rules of typography according to crackpots" article in a 1993 issue of Eye Magazine
content:
Any help in locating the two fonts from this article please? OutWest is Emigre’s but what about the other two: the Jonathan Barnbrook-esque Chronicle and Tribulation (I assume that’s the name of it). I don’t own a copy of the magazine, the image is from a closed eBay auction. Thanks all.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120105201im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eye11_4380.jpg)

 [‹ (x) geometric sans Miami logo - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120105201/http:/typophile.com/node/33512 "Go to previous forum topic") [Alte Schule script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120105201/http:/typophile.com/node/33404 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Angel71
